com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Interface MenuSelectContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MenuContainer, Serializable, WComponent, WebComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WMenu, WSubMenu

    public interface MenuSelectContainer
extends MenuContainer
    Indicates a menu container can have its menu items selected.
    Since:
    1.0.2
    Author:
    Jonathan Austin
